column2: Figure 3.16: Representative GPT-3 completions for the few-shot task of using a new word in a sentence. Boldface is
GPT-3Â’s completions, plain text is human prompts. In the first example both the prompt and the completion are provided
by a human; this then serves as conditioning for subsequent examples where GPT-3 receives successive additional
prompts and provides the completions. Nothing task-specific is provided to GPT-3 other than the conditioning shown
